98  public function __construct() {
99  parent::__construct ();
100  DAO::$transformerOp='toView';
101  $this->insertJquerySemantic ();

103  $this->config = include ($this->configFile);

107  public function initialize() {
108  ob_start ( array (__class__,'_error_handler' ) );
109  if (URequest::isAjax () === false) {
110  $semantic = $this->jquery->semantic ();
111  $mainMenuElements = $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getMainMenuElements ();
112  $elements = [ "UbiquityMyAdmin" ];
113  $dataAjax = [ "index" ];
114  $hrefs = [ $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/index" ];
115  foreach ( $mainMenuElements as $elm => $values ) {
116  $elements [] = $elm;
117  $dataAjax [] = $values [0];
118  $hrefs [] = $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/" . $values [0];
119  }
120  $mn = $semantic->htmlMenu ( "mainMenu", $elements );
121  $mn->getItem ( 0 )->addClass ( "header" )->addIcon ( "home big link" );
122  $mn->setPropertyValues ( "data-ajax", $dataAjax );
123  $mn->setPropertyValues ( "href", $hrefs );
124  $mn->setActiveItem ( 0 );
125  $mn->setSecondary ();
126  $mn->getOnClick ( "Admin", "#main-content", [ "attr" => "data-ajax","historize" => true ] );
127  $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
128  $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewHeader () );
129  }
130  $this->scaffold = new AdminScaffoldController ( $this, $this->jquery );
131  }
132 
133  public static function _error_handler($buffer) {
134  $e = error_get_last ();
135  if ($e) {
136  if ($e ['file'] != 'xdebug://debug-eval' && ! UResponse::isJSON ()) {
137  $staticName = "msg-" . rand ( 0, 50 );
138  $message = new HtmlMessage ( $staticName );
139  $message->addClass ( "error" );
140  $message->addHeader ( "Error" );
141  $message->addList ( [ "<b>Message :</b> " . $e ['message'],"<b>File :</b> " . $e ['file'],"<b>Line :</b> " . $e ['line'] ] );
142  $message->setIcon ( "bug" );
143  switch ($e ['type']) {
144  case E_ERROR :
145  case E_PARSE :
146  return $message;
147  default :
148  return str_replace ( $e ['message'], "", $buffer ) . $message;
149  }
150  } else {
151  return str_replace ( $e ['message'], "", $buffer );
152  }
153  }
154  return $buffer;
155  }
156 
157  public function finalize() {
158  if (! URequest::isAjax ()) {
159  $this->loadView ( "@framework/Admin/main/vFooter.html", [ "js" => $this->initializeJs () ] );
160  }
161  ob_end_flush ();
162  }
163 
164  protected function initializeJs() {
165  $js = 'var setAceEditor=function(elementId,readOnly,mode,maxLines){
166  mode=mode || "sql";readOnly=readOnly || false;maxLines=maxLines || 100;
167  var editor = ace.edit(elementId);
168  editor.setTheme("ace/theme/solarized_dark");
169  editor.getSession().setMode({path:"ace/mode/"+mode, inline:true});
170  editor.setOptions({
171  maxLines: maxLines,
172  minLines: 2,
173  showInvisibles: true,
174  showGutter: !readOnly,
175  showPrintMargin: false,
176  readOnly: readOnly,
177  showLineNumbers: !readOnly,
178  highlightActiveLine: !readOnly,
179  highlightGutterLine: !readOnly
180  });
181  };';
182  return $this->jquery->inline ( $js );
183  }

193  public function models($hasHeader = true) {
194  $semantic = $this->jquery->semantic ();
195  $header = "";
196  if ($hasHeader === true) {
197  $header = $this->getHeader ( "models" );
198  $stepper = $this->_getModelsStepper ();
199  }
200  if ($this->_isModelsCompleted () || $hasHeader !== true) {
201  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
202  try {
203  $models = CacheManager::getModels ( $config, true );
204  $menu = $semantic->htmlMenu ( "menuDbs" );
205  $menu->setVertical ()->setInverted ();
206  foreach ( $models as $model ) {
207  $count = DAO::count ( $model );
208  $item = $menu->addItem ( ClassUtils::getClassSimpleName ( $model ) );
209  $item->addLabel ( $count );
210  $tbl = OrmUtils::getTableName ( $model );
211  $item->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $tbl );
212  $item->setProperty ( "data-model", str_replace ( "\\", ".", $model ) );
213  }
214  $menu->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/showModel", "#divTable", [ "attr" => "data-model","historize" => true ] );
215  $menu->onClick ( "$('.ui.label.left.pointing.teal').removeClass('left pointing teal');$(this).find('.ui.label').addClass('left pointing teal');" );
216  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
217  throw $e;
218  $this->showSimpleMessage ( "Models cache is not created!&nbsp;", "error", "Exception", "warning circle", null, "errorMsg" );
219  }
220  $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
221  $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewDataIndex () );
222  } else {
223  echo $header;
224  echo $stepper;
225  echo "<div id='models-main'>";
226  $this->_loadModelStep ();
227  echo "</div>";
228  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
229  }
230  }

242  $input->labeledCheckbox ( Direction::LEFT, "View", "v", "slider" );

259  $bt->addIcon ( "filter" );

262  $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewControllersIndex () );

265  public function _refreshControllers($refresh = false) {
266  $dt = $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getControllersDataTable ( ControllerAction::init () );
267  $this->jquery->postOnClick ( "._route[data-ajax]", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/routes", "{filter:$(this).attr('data-ajax')}", "#main-content" );
268  $this->jquery->postOnClick ( "._create-view", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_createView", "{action:$(this).attr('data-action'),controller:$(this).attr('data-controller'),controllerFullname:$(this).attr('data-controllerFullname')}", '$(self).closest("._views-container")', [ 'hasLoader' => false ] );
269  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$('#bt-0-controllersAdmin._clickFirst').click();" );
270  $this->jquery->postOnClick ( "._add-new-action", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_newActionFrm", "{controller:$(this).attr('data-controller')}", "#modal", [ "hasLoader" => false ] );
271  $this->addNavigationTesting ();
272  if ($refresh === "refresh") {
273  echo $dt;
274  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
275  }

285  if (isset ( $_POST ["filter"] ))

298  public function cache() {

301 
302  $cacheFiles = CacheManager::$cache->getCacheFiles ( 'controllers' );
303  $cacheFiles = \array_merge ( $cacheFiles, CacheManager::$cache->getCacheFiles ( 'models' ) );
304  $form = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlForm ( "frmCache" );
305  $radios = HtmlFormFields::checkeds ( "ctvv", "cacheTypes[]", [ "controllers" => "Controllers","models" => "Models","views" => "Views","queries" => "Queries","annotations" => "Annotations","seo" => "SEO","contents" => "Contents" ], "Display cache types: ", [ "controllers","models" ] );
306  $radios->postFormOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/setCacheTypes", "frmCache", "#dtCacheFiles tbody", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","preventDefault" => false ] );
307  $form->addField ( $radios )->setInline ();
308  $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getCacheDataTable ( $cacheFiles );
309  $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
310  $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewCacheIndex () );
311  }

319  $token = "";

321  $token = $_SESSION ["_token"];
322  }

366  }

380  public function translate() {

393  protected function _seo() {
394  $ctrls = ControllerSeo::init ();
395  $dtCtrl = $this->jquery->semantic ()->dataTable ( "seoCtrls", "Ubiquity\controllers\admin\popo\ControllerSeo", $ctrls );
396  $dtCtrl->setFields ( [ 'name','urlsFile','siteMapTemplate','route','inRobots','see' ] );
397  $dtCtrl->setIdentifierFunction ( 'getName' );
398  $dtCtrl->setCaptions ( [ 'Controller name','Urls file','SiteMap template','Route','In robots?','' ] );
399  $dtCtrl->fieldAsLabel ( 'route', 'car', [ 'jsCallback' => function ($lbl, $instance, $i, $index) {
400  if ($instance->getRoute () == "") {
401  $lbl->setProperty ( 'style', 'display:none;' );
402  }
403  } ] );
404  $dtCtrl->fieldAsCheckbox ( 'inRobots', [ 'type' => 'toggle','disabled' => true ] );
405  $dtCtrl->setValueFunction ( 'see', function ($value, $instance, $index) {
406  if ($instance->urlExists ()) {
407  $bt = new HtmlButton ( 'see-' . $index, '', '_see circular basic right floated' );
408  $bt->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $instance->getName () );
409  $bt->asIcon ( 'eye' );
410  return $bt;
411  }
412  } );
413  $dtCtrl->setValueFunction ( 'urlsFile', function ($value, $instance, $index) {
414  if (! $instance->urlExists ()) {
415  $elm = new HtmlSemDoubleElement ( 'urls-' . $index, 'span', '', $value );
416  $elm->addIcon ( "warning circle red" );
417  $elm->addPopup ( "Missing", $value . ' is missing!' );
418  return $elm;
419  }
420  return $value;
421  } );
422  $dtCtrl->addDeleteButton ( false, [ ], function ($bt) {
423  $bt->setProperty ( 'class', 'ui circular basic red right floated icon button _delete' );
424  } );
425  $dtCtrl->setTargetSelector ( [ "delete" => "#messages" ] );
426  $dtCtrl->setUrls ( [ "delete" => $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/deleteSeoController" ] );
427  $dtCtrl->getOnRow ( 'click', $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . '/displaySiteMap', '#seo-details', [ 'attr' => 'data-ajax','hasLoader' => false ] );
428  $dtCtrl->setHasCheckboxes ( true );
429  $dtCtrl->setSubmitParams ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . '/generateRobots', "#messages", [ 'attr' => '','ajaxTransition' => 'random' ] );
430  $dtCtrl->setActiveRowSelector ( 'error' );
431  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( "._see", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/seeSeoUrl", "#messages", [ "attr" => "data-ajax" ] );
432  $this->jquery->execOn ( 'click', '#generateRobots', '$("#frm-seoCtrls").form("submit");' );
433  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( '#addNewSeo', $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . '/_newSeoController', '#seo-details' );
434  return $dtCtrl;
435  }

437  public function git($hasMessage = true) {
438  $loader = '<div class="ui active inline centered indeterminate text loader">Waiting for git operation...</div>';
439  $this->getHeader ( "git" );
440  $gitRepo = $this->_getRepo ();
441  $initializeBt = "";
442  $pushPullBts = "";
443  $gitIgnoreBt = "";
444  $btRefresh = "";
445  if (! $gitRepo->getInitialized ()) {
446  $initializeBt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlButton ( "initialize-bt", "Initialize repository", "orange" );
447  $initializeBt->addIcon ( "magic" );
448  $initializeBt->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/gitInit", "#main-content", [ "attr" => "" ] );
449  if ($hasMessage)
450  $this->showSimpleMessage ( "<b>{$gitRepo->getName()}</b> respository is not initialized!", "warning", null, "warning circle", null, "init-message" );
451  } else {
452  if ($hasMessage) {
453  $this->showSimpleMessage ( "<b>{$gitRepo->getName()}</b> repository is correctly initialized.", "info", null, "info circle", null, "init-message" );
454  }
455  $pushPullBts = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlButtonGroups ( "push-pull-bts", [ "3-Push","1-Pull" ] );
456  $pushPullBts->addIcons ( [ "upload","download" ] );
457  $pushPullBts->setPropertyValues ( "data-ajax", [ "gitPush","gitPull" ] );
458  $pushPullBts->addPropertyValues ( "class", [ "blue","black" ] );
459  $pushPullBts->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute (), "#messages", [ "attr" => "data-ajax","ajaxLoader" => $loader ] );
460  $pushPullBts->setPropertyValues ( "style", "width: 260px;" );
461  $gitIgnoreBt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlButton ( "gitIgnore-bt", ".gitignore" );
462  $gitIgnoreBt->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/gitIgnoreEdit", "#frm", [ "attr" => "" ] );
463  $btRefresh = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlButton ( "refresh-bt", "Refresh files", "green" );
464  $btRefresh->addIcon ( "sync alternate" );
465  $btRefresh->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/refreshFiles", "#dtGitFiles", [ "attr" => "","jqueryDone" => "replaceWith","hasLoader" => false ] );
466  }
467 
468  $this->jquery->exec ( '$.fn.form.settings.rules.checkeds=function(value){var fields = $("[name=\'files-to-commit[]\']:checked");return fields.length>0;};', true );
469  $files = $gitRepo->getFiles ();
470  $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getGitFilesDataTable ( $files );
471  $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getGitCommitsDataTable ( $gitRepo->getCommits () );
472 
473  $this->jquery->exec ( '$("#lbl-changed").toggle(' . ((sizeof ( $files ) > 0) ? "true" : "false") . ');', true );
474 
475  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( "#settings-btn", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/frmSettings", "#frm" );
476  $this->jquery->exec ( '$("#commit-frm").form({"fields":{"summary":{"rules":[{"type":"empty"}]},"files-to-commit[]":{"rules":[{"type":"checkeds","prompt":"You must select at least 1 file!"}]}},"on":"blur","onSuccess":function(event,fields){' . $this->jquery->postFormDeferred ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/commit", "commit-frm", "#messages", [
477  "preventDefault" => true,
478  "stopPropagation" => true,
479  "ajaxLoader" => $loader ] ) . ';return false;}});', true );
480  $this->jquery->exec ( '$("#git-tabs .item").tab();', true );
481  $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
482  $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewGitIndex (), [ "repo" => $gitRepo,"initializeBt" => $initializeBt,"gitIgnoreBt" => $gitIgnoreBt,"pushPullBts" => $pushPullBts,"btRefresh" => $btRefresh ] );
483  }

544  private function _getClassToYuml($model, $post) {
545  if (isset ( $post ["properties"] )) {
546  $props = \array_flip ( $post ["properties"] );
547  $yuml = new ClassToYuml ( $model, isset ( $props ["displayProperties"] ), isset ( $props ["displayAssociations"] ), isset ( $props ["displayMethods"] ), isset ( $props ["displayMethodsParams"] ), isset ( $props ["displayPropertiesTypes"] ), isset ( $props ["displayAssociationClassProperties"] ) );
548  if (isset ( $props ["displayAssociations"] )) {
549  $yuml->init ( true, true, true );
550  }
551  } else {
552  $yuml = new ClassToYuml ( $model, ! isset ( $_POST ["refresh"] ) );
553  $yuml->init ( true, true, true );
554  }
555  return $yuml;
556  }
557 
558  private function _getClassesToYuml($post) {
559  if (isset ( $post ["properties"] )) {
560  $props = \array_flip ( $post ["properties"] );
561  $yuml = new ClassesToYuml ( isset ( $props ["displayProperties"] ), isset ( $props ["displayAssociations"] ), isset ( $props ["displayMethods"] ), isset ( $props ["displayMethodsParams"] ), isset ( $props ["displayPropertiesTypes"] ) );
562  } else {
563  $yuml = new ClassesToYuml ( ! isset ( $_POST ["refresh"] ), ! isset ( $_POST ["refresh"] ) );
564  }
565  return $yuml;
566  }

597  $list->addCheckedList ( [ "displayAssociationClassProperties" => "Associated class members" ], [ "Associations","displayAssociations" ], [ "displayAssociations" ], true, "properties[]" );

607  $ddSize->asSelect ( "size" );
608  $this->jquery->postOn ( "change", "#size", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . $url, $params, $responseElement, [ "ajaxTransition" => "random","attr" => "" ] );
609  $menu->wrap ( "<form id='frmProperties' name='frmProperties'>", "</form>" );
610  $menu->addItem ( $ddSize );
611  return $menu;
612  }

668  public function _runPostWithParams($method = "post", $type = "parameter", $origine = "routes") {
669  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
670  $model = null;
671  $actualParams = [ ];
672  $url = $_POST ["url"];
673  if (isset ( $_POST ["method"] ))
674  $method = $_POST ["method"];
675  if (isset ( $_POST ["model"] )) {
676  $model = $_POST ["model"];
677  }
678 
679  if ($origine === "routes") {
680  $responseElement = "#modal";
681  $responseURL = "/_runAction";
682  $jqueryDone = "html";
683  $toUpdate = "";
684  } else {
685  $toUpdate = $_POST ["toUpdate"];
686  $responseElement = "#" . $toUpdate;
687  $responseURL = "/_saveRequestParams/" . $type;
688  $jqueryDone = "replaceWith";
689  }
690  if (isset ( $_POST ["actualParams"] )) {
691  $actualParams = $this->_getActualParamsAsArray ( $_POST ["actualParams"] );
692  }
693  $modal = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlModal ( "response-with-params", "Parameters for the " . \strtoupper ( $method ) . ":" . $url );
694  $frm = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlForm ( "frmParams" );
695  $frm->addMessage ( "msg", "Enter your " . $type . "s.", \ucfirst ( $method ) . " " . $type . "s", "info circle" );
696  $index = 0;
697  foreach ( $actualParams as $name => $value ) {
698  $this->_addNameValueParamFields ( $frm, $type, $name, $value, $index ++ );
699  }
700  $this->_addNameValueParamFields ( $frm, $type, "", "", $index ++ );
701 
702  $fieldsButton = $frm->addFields ();
703  $fieldsButton->addClass ( "_notToClone" );
704  $fieldsButton->addButton ( "clone", "Add " . $type, "yellow" )->setTagName ( "div" );
705  if ($model != null) {
706  $model = UbiquityUtils::getModelsName ( Startup::getConfig (), $model );
707  $modelFields = OrmUtils::getSerializableFields ( $model );
708  if (\sizeof ( $modelFields ) > 0) {
709  $modelFields = \array_combine ( $modelFields, $modelFields );
710  $ddModel = $fieldsButton->addDropdown ( "bt-addModel", $modelFields, "Add " . $type . "s from " . $model );
711  $ddModel->asButton ();
712  $this->jquery->click ( "#dropdown-bt-addModel .item", "
713  var text=$(this).text();
714  var count=0;
715  var empty=null;
716  $('#frmParams input[name=\'name[]\']').each(function(){
717  if($(this).val()==text) count++;
718  if($(this).val()=='') empty=this;
719  });
720  if(count<1){
721  if(empty==null){
722  $('#clone').click();
723  var inputs=$('.fields:not(._notToClone)').last().find('input');
724  inputs.first().val($(this).text());
725  }else{
726  $(empty).val($(this).text());
727  }
728  }
729  " );
730  }
731  }
732  if (isset ( $_COOKIE [$method] ) && \sizeof ( $_COOKIE [$method] ) > 0) {
733  $dd = $fieldsButton->addDropdownButton ( "btMem", "Memorized " . $type . "s", $_COOKIE [$method] )->getDropdown ()->setPropertyValues ( "data-mem", \array_map ( "addslashes", $_COOKIE [$method] ) );
734  $cookiesIndex = \array_keys ( $_COOKIE [$method] );
735  $dd->each ( function ($i, $item) use ($cookiesIndex) {
736  $bt = new HtmlButton ( "bt-" . $item->getIdentifier () );
737  $bt->asIcon ( "remove" )->addClass ( "basic _deleteParam" );
738  $bt->getOnClick ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_deleteCookie", null, [ "attr" => "data-value" ] );
739  $bt->setProperty ( "data-value", $cookiesIndex [$i] );
740  $bt->onClick ( "$(this).parents('.item').remove();" );
741  $item->addContent ( $bt, true );
742  } );
743  $this->jquery->click ( "[data-mem]", "
744  var objects=JSON.parse($(this).text());
745  $.each(objects, function(name, value) {
746  $('#clone').click();
747  var inputs=$('.fields:not(._notToClone)').last().find('input');
748  inputs.first().val(name);
749  inputs.last().val(value);
750  });
751  $('.fields:not(._notToClone)').each(function(){
752  var inputs=$(this).find('input');
753  if(inputs.last().val()=='' && inputs.last().val()=='')
754  if($('.fields').length>2)
755  $(this).remove();
756  });
757  " );
758  }
759  $this->jquery->click ( "._deleteParameter", "
760  if($('.fields').length>2)
761  $(this).parents('.fields').remove();
762  ", true, true, true );
763  $this->jquery->click ( "#clone", "
764  var cp=$('.fields:not(._notToClone)').last().clone(true);
765  var num = parseInt( cp.prop('id').match(/\d+/g), 10 ) +1;
766  cp.find( '[id]' ).each( function() {
767  var num = $(this).attr('id').replace( /\d+$/, function( strId ) { return parseInt( strId ) + 1; } );
768  $(this).attr( 'id', num );
769  $(this).val('');
770  });
771  cp.insertBefore($('#clone').closest('.fields'));" );
772  $frm->setValidationParams ( [ "on" => "blur","inline" => true ] );
773  $frm->setSubmitParams ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . $responseURL, $responseElement, [ "jqueryDone" => $jqueryDone,"params" => "{toUpdate:'" . $toUpdate . "',method:'" . \strtoupper ( $method ) . "',url:'" . $url . "'}" ] );
774  $modal->setContent ( $frm );
775  $modal->addAction ( "Validate" );
776  $this->jquery->click ( "#action-response-with-params-0", "$('#frmParams').form('submit');", false, false, false );
777 
778  $modal->addAction ( "Close" );
779  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('.dimmer.modals.page').html('');$('#response-with-params').modal('show');", true );
780  echo $modal->compile ( $this->jquery, $this->view );
781  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
782  }
783  }
784 
785  protected function _getActualParamsAsArray($urlEncodedParams) {
786  $result = [ ];
787  $params = [ ];
788  \parse_str ( urldecode ( $urlEncodedParams ), $params );
789  if (isset ( $params ["name"] )) {
790  $names = $params ["name"];
791  $values = $params ["value"];
792  $count = \sizeof ( $names );
793  for($i = 0; $i < $count; $i ++) {
794  $name = $names [$i];
795  if (UString::isNotNull ( $name )) {
796  if (isset ( $values [$i] ))
797  $result [$name] = $values [$i];
798  }
799  }
800  }
801  return $result;
802  }
803 
804  protected function _addNameValueParamFields($frm, $type, $name, $value, $index) {
805  $fields = $frm->addFields ();
806  $fields->addInput ( "name[]", \ucfirst ( $type ) . " name" )->getDataField ()->setIdentifier ( "name-" . $index )->setProperty ( "value", $name );
807  $input = $fields->addInput ( "value[]", \ucfirst ( $type ) . " value" );
808  $input->getDataField ()->setIdentifier ( "value-" . $index )->setProperty ( "value",htmlentities($value) );
809  $input->addAction ( "", true, "remove" )->addClass ( "icon basic _deleteParameter" );
810  }
811 
812  public function _deleteCookie($index, $type = "post") {
813  $name = $type . "[" . $index . "]";
814  if (isset ( $_COOKIE [$type] [$index] )) {
815  \setcookie ( $name, "", \time () - 3600, "/", "127.0.0.1" );
816  }
817  }
818 
819  private function _setPostCookie($content, $method = "post", $index = null) {
820  if (isset ( $_COOKIE [$method] )) {
821  $cookieValues = \array_values ( $_COOKIE [$method] );
822  if ((\array_search ( $content, $cookieValues )) === false) {
823  if (! isset ( $index ))
824  $index = \sizeof ( $_COOKIE [$method] );
825  setcookie ( $method . "[" . $index . "]", $content, \time () + 36000, "/", "127.0.0.1" );
826  }
827  } else {
828  if (! isset ( $index ))
829  $index = 0;
830  setcookie ( $method . "[" . $index . "]", $content, \time () + 36000, "/", "127.0.0.1" );
831  }
832  }
833 
834  private function _setGetCookie($index, $content) {
835  setcookie ( "get[" . $index . "]", $content, \time () + 36000, "/", "127.0.0.1" );
836  }
837 
838  public function _runAction($frm = null) {
839  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
840  $url = URequest::cleanUrl ( $_POST ["url"] );
841  unset ( $_POST ["url"] );
842  $method = $_POST ["method"];
843  unset ( $_POST ["method"] );
844  $newParams = null;
845  $postParams = $_POST;
846  if (\sizeof ( $_POST ) > 0) {
847  if (\strtoupper ( $method ) === "POST" && $frm !== "frmGetParams") {
848  $postParams = [ ];
849  $keys = $_POST ["name"];
850  $values = $_POST ["value"];
851  for($i = 0; $i < \sizeof ( $values ); $i ++) {
852  if ($keys [$i] != null)
853  $postParams [$keys [$i]] = $values [$i];
854  }
855  if (\sizeof ( $postParams ) > 0) {
856  $this->_setPostCookie ( \json_encode ( $postParams ) );
857  }
858  } else {
859  $newParams = $_POST;
860  $this->_setGetCookie ( $url, \json_encode ( $newParams ) );
861  }
862  }
863  $modal = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlModal ( "response", \strtoupper ( $method ) . ":" . $url );
864  $params = $this->getRequiredRouteParameters ( $url, $newParams );
865  if (\sizeof ( $params ) > 0) {
866  $toPost = \array_merge ( $postParams, [ "method" => $method,"url" => $url ] );
867  $frm = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlForm ( "frmGetParams" );
868  $frm->addMessage ( "msg", "You must complete the following parameters before continuing navigation testing", "Required URL parameters", "info circle" );
869  $paramsValues = $this->_getParametersFromCookie ( $url, $params );
870  foreach ( $paramsValues as $param => $value ) {
871  $frm->addInput ( $param, \ucfirst ( $param ) )->addRule ( "empty" )->setValue ( $value );
872  }
873  $frm->setValidationParams ( [ "on" => "blur","inline" => true ] );
874  $frm->setSubmitParams ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_runAction", "#modal", [ "params" => \json_encode ( $toPost ) ] );
875  $modal->setContent ( $frm );
876  $modal->addAction ( "Validate" );
877  $this->jquery->click ( "#action-response-0", "$('#frmGetParams').form('submit');" );
878  } else {
879  $this->jquery->ajax ( $method, $url, '#content-response.content', [ "params" => \json_encode ( $postParams ) ] );
880  }
881  $modal->addAction ( "Close" );
882  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('.dimmer.modals.page').html('');$('#response').modal('show');", true );
883  echo $modal;
884  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
885  }
886  }
887 
888  private function _getParametersFromCookie($url, $params) {
889  $result = \array_fill_keys ( $params, "" );
890  if (isset ( $_COOKIE ["get"] )) {
891  if (isset ( $_COOKIE ["get"] [$url] )) {
892  $values = \json_decode ( $_COOKIE ["get"] [$url], true );
893  foreach ( $params as $p ) {
894  $result [$p] = @$values [$p];
895  }
896  }
897  }
898  return $result;
899  }
900 
901  private function getRequiredRouteParameters(&$url, $newParams = null) {
902  $url = stripslashes ( $url );
903  $route = Router::getRouteInfo ( $url );
904  if ($route === false) {
905  $ns = Startup::getNS ();
906  $u = \explode ( "/", $url );
907  $controller = $ns . $u [0];
908  if (\sizeof ( $u ) > 1)
909  $action = $u [1];
910  else
911  $action = "index";
912  if (isset ( $newParams ) && \sizeof ( $newParams ) > 0) {
913  $url = $u [0] . "/" . $action . "/" . \implode ( "/", \array_values ( $newParams ) );
914  return [ ];
915  }
916  } else {
917  if (isset ( $newParams ) && \sizeof ( $newParams ) > 0) {
918  $routeParameters = $route ["parameters"];
919  $i = 0;
920  foreach ( $newParams as $v ) {
921  if (isset ( $routeParameters [$i] ))
922  $result [( int ) $routeParameters [$i ++]] = $v;
923  }
924  ksort ( $result );
925 
926  $url = vsprintf ( \preg_replace ( '#\([^\)]+\)#', '%s', $url ), $result );
927  return [ ];
928  }
929  $controller = $route ["controller"];
930  $action = $route ["action"];
931  }
932  if (! is_string ( $controller )) {
933  if (is_callable ( $controller )) {
934  $func = new \ReflectionFunction ( $controller );
935  return \array_map ( function ($e) {
936  return $e->name;
937  }, \array_slice ( $func->getParameters (), 0, $func->getNumberOfRequiredParameters () ) );
938  }
939  return [ ];
940  }
941  if (\class_exists ( $controller )) {
942  if (\method_exists ( $controller, $action )) {
943  $method = new \ReflectionMethod ( $controller, $action );
944  return \array_map ( function ($e) {
945  return $e->name;
946  }, \array_slice ( $method->getParameters (), 0, $method->getNumberOfRequiredParameters () ) );
947  }
948  }
949  return [ ];
950  }
951 
952  protected function _createController($controllerName, $variables = [], $ctrlTemplate = 'controller.tpl', $hasView = false, $jsCallback = "") {
953  return $this->scaffold->_createController ( $controllerName, $variables, $ctrlTemplate, $hasView, $jsCallback );
954  }
955 
956  protected function _addMessageForRouteCreation($path, $jsCallback = "") {
957  $msgContent = "<br>Created route : <b>" . $path . "</b>";
958  $msgContent .= "<br>You need to re-init Router cache to apply this update:";
959  $btReinitCache = new HtmlButton ( "bt-init-cache", "(Re-)Init router cache", "orange" );
960  $btReinitCache->addIcon ( "refresh" );
961  $msgContent .= "&nbsp;" . $btReinitCache;
962  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( "#bt-init-cache", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/_refreshCacheControllers", "#messages", [ "attr" => "","hasLoader" => false,"dataType" => "html","jsCallback" => $jsCallback ] );
963  return $msgContent;
964  }
